intro.title: Trading Company Official Page
intro.description: Providing superior quality food products from Asia since 2015

about.title: About us
about.description:
Founded in 2015, Russian Trading Company has great potential and reliable reputation.

 We are the exclusive supplier of Gummi Zone, Gold Kili, Fun Bites, Corniche brands in Russia. We are proud of our unique partners and brands that use all the most natural ingredients and high quality standards. We constantly strive to offer the best for our consumers. We currently cooperate with leading distribution companies in most regions of Russia and have contracts with local and federal chains.
about.slogan: We build relationships with our partners on the basis of mutual benefit, honesty, responsibility and discipline!

items.matcha-latte-with-ginger: Matcha Late Gold Kili with Ginger

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.benefit1: We only partner with trusted brands and companies that offer high quality products that are fully certified to advanced standards.
benefits.benefit2: All our products are absolutely safe and have international certificates such as Halal, ISO, HACCP, EAC.
